sentences.english: Small niches line the walkway and are illuminated by diyas (small lamps) in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 小壁龕沿走道排布，晚上被小油燈照亮。

sentences.english: Dooku couldn't quite see the other droid around the edge of the alcove.
sentences.chinese: 杜庫從壁龕的角上看不太清楚另一個機器人。

sentences.english: Madeleine placed it carefully in the rocky niche.
sentences.chinese: 瑪德琳小心翼翼地把它放在岩石壁龕裏。

sentences.english: When going through the door, look up and right and you'll see an alcove.
sentences.chinese: 進門之後向右上方看，你將找到一個壁龕。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, the stone was found close by the apse of the church.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，石頭是在聖堂靠近半圓壁龕處被發現的。

sentences.english: You should see an alcove with the trophy.
sentences.chinese: 你應該能看到一個有一個獎盃的壁龕。

sentences.english: Statues in the niches of the facade.
In every niche in the wall.
A study on sculpting these depths allowed to create a variety of cavities, niches and alcoves.
sentences.chinese: 研究這些造型深度允許創造各種穴，壁龕和壁櫥。

sentences.english: A similar rocky protrusion was noticed in the north apse .
sentences.chinese: 在北側半圓壁龕另有一塊相似的石頭。

sentences.english: On your left there will be a small alcove past a bird walking around.
sentences.chinese: 在您的左邊會有一個小壁龕過去一走動鳥。

sentences.english: Walkway alcove is the perfect setting for a secluded moment.
sentences.chinese: 天橋壁龕是一個僻靜的時刻完美的環境。

sentences.english: There are natural lighted alcoves for two by the window where guests can enjoy the city view.
sentences.chinese: 還有兩間明亮的壁龕讓客人可以俯瞰城市風景。

definition: white marble/a type of white marble used for building and sculpting
